listitem.para: Set the session-expiry-interval property on the CONNECT packet. If you use this option, the client will be set to be an MQTT v5 client. Set to 0-4294967294 to specify the session will expire in that many seconds after the client disconnects, or use -1, 4294967295, or âˆž for a session that does not expire. Defaults to -1 if -c is also given, or 0 if -c not given.
If the session is set to never expire, either with -x or -c, then a client id must be provided.
